name: L-Home
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn off the light”
”Alexa, turn the light to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The user account binding operation of L-Home APP could be completed quickly according to the following steps:
1.Download L-Home APP through Apple store or Google play or scan the QR code, then register and login;
2.Open 「L-Home」App, click the top right “+” to add the devices（Super panel, home appliance module, smart lighting, wall switch, etc.）. According to the installation guide,finish the configuration of the devices;
3.Open the 「Amazon Alexa」APP, and click the tab to“More”,and enter“ Skills & Games”. Click the top right “Search”. Enter “L-Home” for searching the skills. Click “ENABLE TO USE”to login account and password of “L-Home”, done the binding. 
5.Click “ DISCOVER DEVICES”to search devices that you are going to add and control by Alexa. 
6.Feel free to contact us if any question: 400-716-8928

Supported devices
Air conditioning, fan, TV, led strips, ceiling light, down light, spot light, wall switch, etc.
